## Installation

ProjectR can be installed in several ways.  To install the current release version (from [R/Bioconductor](http://www.bioconductor.org/)):
```{r, eval=FALSE}
source('http://www.bioconductor.org/biocLite.R')
biocLite('ProjectR')
```

You may also install the developmental version of ProjectR directly from the Github repo:
```{r, eval=FALSE}
require(devtools)
devtools::install_github('genesofeve/projectR')
```
